alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 5:46AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Bay and south central Walton Counties through 645 AM EST/545 AM CST/... At 546 AM EST/446 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Santa Rosa Beach to 24 miles southwest of Panama City Beach. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Seminole Hills, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, Bayou George, West Panama City, Camp Flowers and Seaside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EST/800 AM CST/ for the Panhandle of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton
